com.philips.pins.shinelib.capabilities

Interface SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SHNCapability

    public interface SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization
extends SHNCapability
    Interface to obtain the log of new measurements from a peripheral.

    Also allows setting log synchronization options. Not all options are supported by all peripherals.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization.Option
      Possible options for log synchronization.
      static interface  SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization.SHNCapabilityLogSynchronizationListener
      Interface used to receive notifications about ongoing synchronization.
      static class  SHNCapabilityLogSynchronization.State
      Possible synchronization states.
